actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on December 19, 2023.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following communication from the Secretary of the Senate on December 14, 2023, at 3:27 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 229, S. 265, and S. 318, and agreed to S. Res. 499.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Patrick T. McHenry to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
